Database Administration and Development for very large and complex databases in Microsoft SQL Server  R2 2008 2005 2000 in Development Test and Production Environments on various business domains like Health and Manufacturing Extensively worked on installing configuring optimizing and managing different versions SQL Server 2005 2008 R2 2012 2014 2016 and 2017 updating with latest hot fixes and service packs as per CIS Standards Expert in Migrating from SQL server 2005 to 20082008R2 and 20082008R2 to 26 and 2017 by using InPlace upgrade process as well as sidebyside upgrade process and documented the Upgrade Process Proficiency and expertise in SQL Server BackupRecovery Disaster recovery planning and Security Management Implemented best practices for instance and database level security to safeguard the sensitive data Good exposure with SQL Server High Availability Always ON Availability Groups DB mirroring log shipping and clustering Hands on experience on SQL SERVER 2016 new features like query store IN memory OLTP and database stretching to azure platform Experience in supporting Very Large Database VLDB more than 2 to 4 TB and troubleshooting problems Good understanding in implementing different types of Replication Models such as Transactional Snapshot Created effective Backup and Recovery plan by Transactional Log and Full Database Backups and utilized to recover data in point in time in case of disaster of server Expertise in implementation of security models Database authentication modes creation of logins granting permissions and assigning roles to users on databases Very good experience at Extended events Data Compression Resource Performance Data Collector Wait statistics Hands on Experience in Creating tables views triggers stored procedures and functions using SQL Structured Query Language Hands on experience in data table partitioning Extensively worked on Locks Deadlocks Handling Isolation Level and Concurrency Effects Detect CPU IO Memory Bottlenecks Expertise in Monitoring Event Viewer SQL Error logs and Log File Viewer for Software and hardware related errors Expert in Monitoring Optimization Performance databases and index Analysis Experience in using DMV and dynamic management functions for finding out long running queries Developed and monitored multi task SQL Server Integrating Services SSIS packages and DTS Expertise in performing data transformations between servers using BCP SSIS and bulk insert Exquisite skills in SSMSCreating and scheduling jobs alerts and operators with SQL Server Agent handling BackupRecovery of databases Linked Servers Database Maintenance Planning Expert in Troubleshooting resolving issues on databases and applications to match SLAs and providing training to users Expert in Documentation of SQL Server system and database operations technical specifications functional specifications best practices policies and procedures Provided pre and post deployment support for all the releases Excellent analytical Interpersonal and communication skills fast learner hardworking and versatile team player Ability and experience to work on multiple projects and eager to learn new things Work Experience SQL Database Administrator ADP Roseland NJ March 2018 to Present Responsibilities Maintaining production databases performing periodic patch upgrades and reviewing existing policies and procedures and suggesting suitable changes if necessary Implemented Always on availability groups and Log shipping for disaster recovery Data refresh activities from prod environment to Dev environment and fixing orphan users Migrated onpremise SQL databases to AZURE Portal Created SQL Database on azure based on DTU or pool based as per clients requirements Monitored Azure databases on weekly basis to cut costs on DTU basis Outstanding grasp of ITIL principle and process Resolved business issue and complaints in accordance with appropriate professional standards Implemented Database integrity checks update statistics and reindexing Experienced in using tools like Extended events windows performance monitor and performance counters for monitoring and tuning the SQL Server Performance IDERA Diagnostic manager Managed Production environment for High Availability and implemented Always ON availability group with three replicas for reporting and backup Developed database and database objects as per client requirements Worked on setting up and managing Snapshot and Transactional Replication Involved in Monitoring Performance of different production servers Resolving performance related issues to Blocking Deadlocks and long running queries Worked extensively with Execution plan and Index Tuning Wizard for performance bottlenecks Involved in Migration MS SQL Server 2008 to MS SQL Server 2012 Interacted with concern application team in fixing the problems when ever needed Monitoring and scheduled jobs on production and staging environment Configure SQL DB MAIL for sending server database alerts Responsible in Monitoring and Troubleshooting SQL Server Performance issues Used the query store and Execution Plan to improve the optimization of the TSQL code Performance tuning of SQL queries and stored procedures using query store and extended events and Index Tuning Wizard Provided 24 x 7 Production support for the database and application issues Environment SQL Server 420122008 R2 SQL extended events Clustering Always on Log Shipping Windows 2008 R220032000 Commvault IDERA mgmt SQL Database Administrator LITTLE FUSE
